title: Facetune creator Lightricks to split into two units as AI premium outpaces traditional software
description: The creator of the Facetune photo editing app, Lightricks, is splitting its consumer app business from its generative AI video platform LTX, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters, better positioning itself to capture the growth in artificial intelligence as it reshapes traditional software businesses.
content: NEW YORK, Feb 23 (Reuters) - The creator of the Facetune photo editing app, Lightricks, is splitting its consumer app business from its generative AI video platform LTX, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters, better positioning itself to capt... [2248 chars]

title: For the Gulf States, Investment in AI Is Partly About U.S. Protection
description: Saudi Arabia, Qatar, and the UAE hope to become artificial intelligence hubs.
content: The three most influential Gulf states—Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, and Qatar—are investing hundreds of billions in artificial intelligence. The Emiratis were early movers, staking out a national strategy for AI and naming a minister of st... [5814 chars]

title: Backed by Anthropic, a Super PAC begins an ad blitz in support of AI regulation
description: A new ad campaign on Monday warned northern New Jersey residents that Congress could leave them vulnerable to harm by artificial intelligence.

title: Software, Payments Shares Tumble After Citrini Post on AI Risks
description: Delivery, payments, and software stocks slid sharply Monday after Citrini Research published a report laying out the potential risks that artificial intelligence could pose to various segments of the global economy.
content:

title: Ibpap backs Senate hearing on IT-BPM concerns
description: THE IT and Business Process Association of the Philippines (Ibpap) on Monday expressed support for the filing of Senate Resolution 253 by Sen. Bam Aquino ordering a public hearing by the Committee on Science and Technology on how rapid technological shifts, specifically artificial intelligence and cybersecurity risks, are affecting the country‘s IT-BPM sector.

title: Canadian PM Carney to travel to India on Feb 26
description: The leaders will focus on elevating and expanding the Canada-India relationship, with ambitious new partnerships in trade, energy, technology and artificial intelligence AI, talent and culture, and defence, it said. At last years G20 Leaders Summit, Canada and India agreed to formally launch negotiations for an ambitious Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement that will more than double the two-way trade to USD 70 billion by 2030.
content: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney is scheduled to travel to India on February 26, with the aim of ''expanding'' ties with India and building new partnerships in defence, energy and AI. Carney will first visit Mumbai, then New Delhi, India, where he... [1635 chars]

title: US factory orders fall in December on commercial aircraft bookings
description: New orders for U.S. factory goods fell in December amid a sharp decline in commercial aircraft bookings, but demand elsewhere was strong, partly driven by robust investment in artificial intelligence.
content:
WASHINGTON, Feb 23 (Reuters) - New orders for U.S. factory goods fell in December amid a sharp decline in commercial aircraft bookings, but demand elsewhere was strong, partly driven by robust investment in artificial intelligence.

title: Tata Communications, RailTel join hands to strengthen India's next
description: Tata Communications and RailTel Corporation of India Ltd. entered into a strategic association to strengthen India's digital infrastructure backbone for Artificial Intelligence and next-generation digital services. The collaboration aims to modernise network infrastructure and enhance cyber protection by combining RailTel's national reach with Tata Communications' global digital platforms.

title: UNDP AI Director lauds India's leadership as India, Italy, Kenya announce AI trilateral partnership
description: Keyzom Ngodup Massally, AI Director at the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP), on Monday hailed India's leadership in the Global South as the country announced a historic trilateral partnership on artificial intelligence with Italy and Kenya on the sidelines of the global AI Impact Summit.

title: Anthropic’s CEO to Meet Hegseth Amid Feud Over Pentagon Work
description: Anthropic PBC Chief Executive Officer Dario Amodei will meet with US Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth on Tuesday, according to a senior Pentagon official, as contract talks with the artificial intelligence startup remain deadlocked over the company’s insistence on guardrails for use of its technology.
